doc: Specifies which corner a child widget should be placed in when packed into a . This is effectively the opposite of where the scroll bars are placed.

members.doc: Place the scrollbars on the right and bottom of the widget (default behaviour).
members.name: top_left

members.doc: Place the scrollbars on the top and right of the widget.
members.name: bottom_left

members.doc: Place the scrollbars on the left and bottom of the widget.
members.name: top_right

members.doc: Place the scrollbars on the top and left of the widget.
members.name: bottom_right

name: CornerType
